Exceptions for Existing Buildings
Exceptions for Existing Buildings

• Section F202.5 Qualified Historic Facilities: if SHPO determines compliance with accessible routes, entrances or toilet facilities threatens or destroys the historic significance those elements do not need altering
• Section F202.5 Qualified Historic Facilities: if SHPO determines
compliance with accessible routes, entrances or toilet facilities
threatens or destroys the historic significance those elements do
not need altering

• Leased buildings used by officials servicing disasters on a

• Buildings leased for 12 months or less (provided that the lease

Entrances (Section F206.4)
Entrances (Section F206.4)

Different from UFAS • 60% of public entrances must be
Different from UFAS
• 60% of public entrances must be

accessible (F206.4.1)
accessible (F206.4.1)

• At least 1 restricted or secured entrance must be accessible (F206.4.7)
• At least 1 restricted or secured
entrance must be accessible
(F206.4.7)

• Each direct access from parking structures (F206.4.2) and each direct access from a tunnel or elevated walkway (F206.4.3) to a building entrance must be accessible

structures (F206.4.2) and each
direct access from a tunnel or
elevated walkway (F206.4.3) to a
building entrance must be
accessible
